a.xlink:title: Namespace: default
Application: wordpress
Tier: mysql
Tier: frontend
kind: Service apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: wordpress-mysql ...
kind: Deployment apiVersion: apps/v1 metadata: name: wordpress-mysql ...
spec.selector: app: wordpress tier: mysql
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: mysql-pv-claim ...
kind: ReplicaSet apiVersion: apps/v1 metadata: name: wordpress-mysql ...
kind: Secret apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: mysql-pass ...
kind: Service apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: wordpress ...
kind: Deployment apiVersion: apps/v1 metadata: name: wordpress ...
spec.selector: app: wordpress tier: frontend
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: wp-pv-claim ...
kind: ReplicaSet apiVersion: apps/v1 metadata: name: wordpress ...
kind: Pod apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: wordpress-mysql ...
kind: Pod apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: wordpress ...
kind: Container apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: mysql ...
kind: PodVolume apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: mysql-persistent-storage ...
spec.env[0]: name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD valueFrom: secretKeyRef: key: password name: mysql-pass
spec.env[3]: name: MYSQL_PASSWORD valueFrom: secretKeyRef: key: password name: mysql-pass
spec.volumeMounts[0]: mountPath: /var/lib/mysql name: mysql-persistent-storage
spec.persistentVolumeClaim.claimName: mysql-pv-claim
kind: Container apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: wordpress ...
kind: PodVolume apiVersion: v1 metadata: name: wordpress-persistent-storage ...
spec.env[1]: name: WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD valueFrom: secretKeyRef: key: password name: mysql-pass
spec.volumeMounts[0]: mountPath: /var/www/html name: wordpress-persistent-storage
spec.persistentVolumeClaim.claimName: wp-pv-claim
